mapper.select: /* 국가전체 목록 조회 */ SELECT C.COUNTRY_CODE AS COUNTRY_CODE , IFNULL(CM.MESSAGE, C.COUNTRY_NAME) AS COUNTRY_NAME FROM COUNTRY C LEFT JOIN COUNTRY_MESSAGE CM ON CM.MESSAGE_ID = C.COUNTRY_MESSAGE AND CM.COUNTRY_CODE = #{locale} LEFT JOIN MESSAGE_GROUP MG ON MG.MESSAGE_ID = CM.MESSAGE_ID AND MG.USE_YN <> 0 WHERE C.USE_YN <> 0
/* 국가 중복체크 */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM COUNTRY WHERE COUNTRY_CODE = UPPER(#{countryCode})
mapper.insert: /* 국가 신규 생성 */ INSERT INTO COUNTRY ( COUNTRY_CODE, COUNTRY_MESSAGE, COUNTRY_NAME, USE_YN, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( UPPER(#{vo.countryCode}), #{vo.countryMessage}, #{vo.countryName}, 1, #{vo.creatorId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP(), #{vo.updaterId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP() )
